tool_description: Welcome to the Nigeria API! This API provides endpoints to lookup locations, find facilities and perform geospatial operations such as distance calculation and directions between two locations in Nigeria.
name: Nigeria API
title: Nigeria API

api_list.name: Directions Between 2 Locations
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns information about the route between two locations in terms of distance, duration, and steps.

Below Example: **Directions from Kaduna to Maiduguri**

optional_parameters.name: distance_unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), and **mi**.

api_list.name: Measure Distance
api_list.description:
This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates, while allowing the user to specify the unit of measurement.

Below Example: **Distance between Lagos and Abuja**

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), **mi**, **ft**, and **yd**.

api_list.name: Reverse Geocode
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to perform reverse geocoding in Nigeria by providing query parameters for latitude and longitude. It returns the name of the city where the location is located.

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get facilities in Nigeria like hospital, bank, college, etc. by providing optional query parameters for facility type, state and city. It returns a list of facilities that match the query parameters.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The state where the facility is located

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
The type of amenity facility to search for (default: **hospital**)
Options:
**aerodrome, bar, cafe, fast_food, pub, restaurant, college, driving_school, school, university, bank, atm, pharmacy,** etc..        

[More options->](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_features#Amenity)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of facilities to query.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city where the facility is located

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to lookup locations in Nigeria by providing an address query parameter. It returns the latitude, longitude and city name of the location.
